db:abstract.db:para: Provides QML types for basic Bluetooth operations on devices.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Bluetooth QML Types enable an application to scan for devices and connect and interact with them in an easier way than the C++ Classes. However, it is a bit more limited than the C++ API. You can always use the C++ API to create QML plugins with the flexibility you need.

db:listitem.db:para: Enables searching for the Bluetooth devices and services in range.
Provides information about a particular Bluetooth service.
Enables connecting and communicating with a Bluetooth service or device.
